title: College Hoops 2K7
description: College Hoops 2K7, the #1 rated college basketball videogame franchise  four years running, returns for its sophomore season on the Xbox 360.  With over 325 NCAA Division 1 teams and the deepest legacy mode around,  College Hoops 2K7 defines the college basketball experience.

childDownloads.title: 2K ReelMaker for College Hoops 2K7
childDownloads.description: Download this powerful replay editor and construct your own highlight reels! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: 2K SPORTS COLLEGE HOOPS 2K7 2K ReelMaker Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get the 411 on a cool new add-on for College Hoops 2K7. The 2K ReelMaker allows you to create your own highlight reels or watch and vote on those created by others.

childDownloads.title: 2K SPORTS COLLEGE HOOPS 2K7 Feature Overview Trailer
childDownloads.description: See all of the cool, new features in College Hoops 2K7!

childDownloads.title: 2K SPORTS COLLEGE HOOPS 2K7 PONTIAC POD VIDEO Trailer
childDownloads.description: Download the exclusive Pontiac Virtual NCAA® Final 4® video, driven by POD’s “Lights Out.”

childDownloads.title: College Hoops 2K7 - ACC Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Support your favorite ACC team with these school logo gamer pictures from College Hoops 2K7. Include Gamer Pics for 8 schools, the conference, and 2 general College Hoops pics. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
